title: I, Rain
description: I, Rain is a science kid, from the future 2020 name: Rain FieldsIn the year of 2020, a huge global nuclear missile landed near an elementary school.The nuclear missile from the future destroyed the entire school within seconds.Rain Fields a 5th grade student at Knox county school, was in science class when this nuclearHit and destroyed his school.Rain Fields, was badly hurt with nuclear bomb fuse all over his body.Rain was the only, survival from this deadly nuclear bomb that destroyed his school.I, Rain who real name is Rain Fields, go back into the future to try to stop this nuclearMissile from destroying his school in 2020.This is a great science fiction story book, for kids of all ages.http://scientistrain.blogspot.com/201...
author: Rain Fields
